title: World Events - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/27/18
itunes:title: World Events - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/27/18
description:
George Noory and former ABC News reporter Greg Hunter explore current events in the world, including the unpredictable stock market, President Trump's surprise plan to withdraw troops from Syria and dropping oil prices.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
